overview: Relive the art of perfection with this collection of game highlights, interviews and locker room footage from the University of Oklahoma football team's unblemished 12-0 season in 2004, a year that saw the Sooners nab their third conference title in five years and take a stab at the national championships. Opponents include Texas Tech University, Oklahoma State University, Baylor University and the University of Oregon.
title: 2004 Sooner Football
